All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AggressiveStrategy
Aggressive strategy: chooses the card that leaves the highest valid total (higher risk).
AlertBox
AlertBox utility class.
AlertBoxInterface
 
BotPlayer
Runnable that executes the logic of a bot: - Waits between 2 and 4 seconds - Chooses a card using a strategy - Plays or gets eliminated
BotStrategy
Strategy interface: defines the card selection policy for a bot.
Card
This class represents a card in the game.
CardFactory
Simple factory for creating cards.
Deck
Represents a deck of cards in the game.
DificultController
 
DificultView
A class that creates and manages the Difficulty view window for the game.
GameController
 
GameFacade
Simple facade that wraps operations exposed by GameModel.
GameModel
Main game model.
GameTimer
Game seconds counter thread.
GameView
A class that creates and manages the main game view window for the "Cincuentazo" game.
HomeController
Controller for the home screen of the game, handling the navigation and displaying game instructions.
HomeView
A class that creates and manages the home view window for the "Cincuentazo" game.
main
Main class of the Cincuentazo project.
NoPlayableCardException
Exception thrown when a player has no playable card.
SimpleStrategy
Simple strategy: chooses the first card that can be played without exceeding 50.
